passages.text:
It is the worst snow storm Bloomington has had in years. As a wide-eyed freshman, you need to get back to your dorm as quickly as possible.
You are standing in between Indiana University's most iconic monument, the sample gates. Large limestone arches rise on either side of you split by a  brick pathway leading towards campus.
The snowfall is so thick that you can barely see past your hands.
Behind you, towards the west, the usually busy street of Kirkwood seems eeriely quiet. 
[[Go forward->Empty bench...]] 
[[Go backwards->Kirkwood]] 
[[Go right->Construction]]
[[Go left->Walk]]
passages.name: Sample Gates

passages.text:
You decide to head right and walk south down Indiana to get to your dorm.
As you pass the Kirkwood Observatory you had forgotten about the IU Notify gas leak that was located across from Buffalouies.
Due to the terrible storm, with one miss placed step you fall through the opened manhole and plummet into the sewer.
You died.
passages.name: Construction

passages.text:
You trudge forward up the brick path and onto IU's campus, but with every step, the air grows even colder and uneasiness begins to creep into your thoughts. 
*What is this feeling of paranoia* You wonder 
You stop suddenly in front of three benches laid out in a semicircle. The ones on the right and left are covered in snow, but the middle one shows signs of recent occupation with footprints leading towards the woods. 
Something is missing. [[Follow the footprints->Woods]]
passages.name: Empty bench...

passages.text:
Curiosity gets the better of you and you follow the footprints towards the woods near Swain Hall.
As you wander the snowfall begins to fall thicker and thicker. 
You hear a mechanical whirl behind you.
Spinning around you see red glowing eyes and a metal body shifting towards you.
Herman.
Fear paralyzes you, as he lumbers closer.
[[Run->Run]] 
[[Fight->Fight]]
passages.name: Woods

passages.text:
Like the bewildered freshman that you are, you decide heading towards downtown is the fastest way to your dorm. 
As you make your way down the Kirkwood sidewalk, you begin to notice that every store has boarded up their windows and doors, as if to prevent someone from entering. 
You begin to get a bad feeling about this situation. 
[[Continue forward->Apocalypse]]
[[Return to the Sample Gates->Sample Gates]]
passages.name: Kirkwood

passages.text:
Confident in your navigational skills, you turn left and march through the blizzard and make it to Wright Quad safe and sound.
As you settle into your bed for the night, you close your eyes and in the darkness see a pair of glowing red eyes.
You open your eyes in a panic; knowing that you have narrowly avoided a grim fate.
passages.name: Walk

passages.text:
Fear kicks your natural instincts into gear as you sprint into the gloom hoping that somewhere the doors of Swain West must be near.
You hear the growl of gears getting closer and closer.
*WHAM*
By some miracle the doors were unlocked and you slam them shut turning the bolt lock right as the mechanical monster pounds on the door.
*BAM*
*BAM*
*BAM*
Then, silence.
You heave a small sigh of relief but know that you are not out of the clear yet.
He is coming.
*To be continued...*
passages.name: Run

passages.text:
Unbenounced to this machine of death plowing towards you, you are a double black belt in Brazilian jiu-jitsu. 
With one fatal kick, you crumple the statue into pieces and it collapses in front of you.
Just another day at IU.
passages.name: Fight

passages.text:
After minutes of trudging, you reach Bloomington's downtown.
Much to your dismay, every shop surrounding the once beautiful square has been baracaded with micallaneous objects: chairs, couches, and desks all preventing anyone from entering.
Or anything.
*What is going on?* You wonder to yourself. 
*It's like we're in an apocolypse.*
[[Call friend->Friend]]
[[Keep Walking->Horde]]
[[Turn around->Kirkwoodreturn]]
passages.name: Apocalypse

passages.text:
Frantically, you call your buddy Jason in the hopes of getting a ride home.
The phone rings.
And rings.
No answer
*Thats odd, he always picks up*
[[Leave a message->message]]
[[Keep walking->Horde]] 
[[Turn around->Kirkwoodreturn]]
passages.name: Friend

passages.text:
The blizzard rages as you continue your trek.
Suddenly, piercing the silence, a mechanical groan fills the air. As if a thousand gears began turning.
You hear the faint sound of marching behind you.
Spinning around you gasp as you see, about a hundred yards away, a legion of mechanical robots have begun walking towards you. Illuminated only by their glowing red eyes.
Fear paraylyzes you and you stare in disbelief.
*That is impossible!*
Their leader rides atop a jet black steed seemingly made entirely of steel. He is also mechanical but appears more statue-like, with a black fedora on his head.
*Hogie?*
He has spotted you.
[[Run->Rescue]]
[[Fight->Die]]
passages.name: Horde

passages.text:
You are back at Kirkwood and a feeling of paranoia continues to grow.
[[Go forward ->Sample Gates]]
passages.name: Kirkwoodreturn

passages.text:
You decide to leave Jason a message in the hopes that he will see it.
[[keep walking->horderescue]]
[[Turn around->Kirkwoodreturn]]
passages.name: message

passages.text:
The blizzard rages as you continue your trek.
Suddenly, piercing the silence, a mechanical groan fills the air. As if a thousand gears began turning.
You hear the faint sound of marching behind you.
Spinning around you gasp as you see, about three hundred yards away, a legion of mechanical robots have begun walking towards you. Illuminated only by their glowing red eyes.
Fear paraylyzes you and you stare in disbelief.
*That is impossible!*
Their leader rode atop a jet black steed seemingly made entirely of steel. He was also mechanical but appeared more statue-like, with a black fedora on his head.
*Hogie?*
He has spotted you.
[[run->realrescue]]
[[fight->Die]]
passages.name: horderescue

passages.text:
You turn and run as fast as you can down the street, but the blizzard has gotten stronger.
Sneaking a peak, you see the glowing of red eyes getting closer and closer.
You know that you cannot out run him.
You try to turn sharply down an alley way but slip and fall on a patch of ice.
He is here
You see him get off his horse and walk towards you. The face of once a popular IU icon now twisted into a mechanical mash of gears and metal. He smilies and you know its all over.
You died
passages.name: Rescue

passages.text:
Summoning the courage of one hundred Kelley students, you stand tall as the horde approaches you knowing that if you go down, at least maybe one or two will go down with you.
Hopefully.
As its leader thunders towards you, a brass sword raised high, you think this may not have been the best idea. And if this were to be a fictional game/world you were expericing, you would definitely want to try again.
You died.
passages.name: Die

passages.text:
You sprint down the street, hearing the thundering of hooves behind you.
Sneaking a peak, you see the glowing of red eyes getting closer and closer.
You know that you cannot out run him.
Suddenly a car pulls up in front of you!
"Get in!!" The driver yells.
You dive in to the car right as you feel the cold touch of metal on your leg.
The driver takes off down the road.
"That was close call" he yelled as he sped down the road.
Jason had come to your rescue.
passages.name: realrescue
